info.title: coachee service
info.description: HTTP service for handling coaches, coachees and their transactions

get.description:
AdminGetCoach returns all coach info according to the id

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

put.description:
UpdateCoaches updates a coach

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

post.description:
creates an availability for a coach

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

delete.description:
deletes an availability for a coach

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

post.description:
creates a certification for a coach

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

delete.description:
deletes a certification for a coach

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

post.description:
creates a program for a coach

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

delete.description:
deletes a program for a coach

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `admin`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

post.description: logs in a customer and returns a jwt
logs in a customer and returns a jwt

get.description: GetCoaches returns an array of coaches according to a tag and pagination

post.description: Logs in a coach to stripe express
starts the process of recovering a password

get.description: verifies if a recovery token is still valid

post.description: finalizes the password recovery flow by resetting a new password

get.description: GetCoach returns one coach according to the id

post.description: registers a stripe express account in stripe and associates it to a coach

get.description: LenCoaches returns the amount of coaches with a given tag

post.description:
creates a new order

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `client`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT token used to perform authorization

post.description: starts the process of recovering a password

get.description: verifies if a recovery token is still valid

post.description: finalizes the password recovery flow by resetting a new password
